Detailed Description

Quasi Classical Logic Reasoner 准经典逻辑推理机
算法基于文献 Marquis, P., and Porquet, N. 2001. Computational aspects of quasi-classical entailment. Journal of Applied Non-classical Logics 11:295-312.

List<IVecInt> edu.pku.id.QCReasonerV2.negWeak ( IVecInt  clause ) [private]

弱变换
W(l_1, , l_n) = {i=1}^n +l_i
然后将其取反,由De Morgan律,变换为n个子句 +l_i, i = 1, .. ,n

Parameters:
clause
Returns:
弱变换的结果

List<IVecInt> edu.pku.id.QCReasonerV2.strong ( IVecInt  clause ) [private]

将一个子句进行强变换
算法如下:
S(l_1,,l_n) = (+l_1 +l_2 +l_n) ( -l_1 +l_2 +l_n) ( -l_2 +l_n) ( +l_2 -l_n)

Parameters:
clause要变换的子句
Returns:
强变换的结果
